Uses of Interface
org.greatage.ioc.logging.Logger

Packages that use Logger
org.greatage.ioc.logging This package represents all logging related classes. 
 

Uses of Logger in org.greatage.ioc.logging
 

Classes in org.greatage.ioc.logging that implement Logger
 class AbstractLogger
          This class represent abstract logger implementation that delegates log methods without exception parameter to those with this parameter.
 class ConsoleLogger
          This class represents dummy Logger implementation that logs all messages in console System.out.
 class Jdk14Logger
          This class represents logger implementation for JDK 1.4 logging API.
 class Log4jLogger
          This class represents logger implementation for Log4j logging API.
 class Slf4jLogger
          This class represents logger implementation through Slf4j logging API.
 

Methods in org.greatage.ioc.logging that return Logger
 Logger LoggerSource.getLogger(Class clazz)
          Creates or retrieves logger based on specified class.
 Logger AbstractLoggerSource.getLogger(Class clazz)
          Creates or retrieves logger based on specified class.
 Logger Slf4jLoggerSource.getLogger(String name)
          Creates or retrieves logger based on specified name.
 Logger LoggerSource.getLogger(String name)
          Creates or retrieves logger based on specified name.
 Logger Log4jLoggerSource.getLogger(String name)
          Creates or retrieves logger based on specified name.
 Logger Jdk14LoggerSource.getLogger(String name)
          Creates or retrieves logger based on specified name.
 Logger ConsoleLoggerSource.getLogger(String name)
          Creates or retrieves logger based on specified name.
